testcase.name: Analysis -> prefill new trade > prefills the New Trade form when creating from analysis
analysis errorMapper > maps validation-like error
analysis errorMapper > maps unknown error to generic message
analysis validation > returns error for missing symbol
analysis validation > returns error for invalid price
analysis validation > passes for valid suggestion
TradeJournal compact editor toggle > shows compact summary and toggles editor when Show details clicked
TradeJournal entryDate > prefills entryDate with current datetime (within 2 minutes)
TradeJournal Integration > allows creating, editing, filtering, and deleting trades (desktop)

testcase.name: TradeJournal Integration > prefills new trade form from analysis tab
mapTradeError > maps field error objects
mapTradeError > returns default message for unknown errors
validateNewTrade > returns no errors for a valid input
validateNewTrade > returns market error when market empty
validateNewTrade > returns size and price errors for invalid numbers
validateNewTrade > returns errors when sl/margin/leverage missing
TradeService > should add and list trades
TradeService > should update a trade
LocalStorageTradeRepository > saves and retrieves trades

testcase.name: TradeDetailEditor compact > applies compact class and renders save button with saveBtn class
TradeDetailEditor delete flow > calls onDelete with the trade id when Delete clicked
TradeDetailEditor > calls onSave with updated trade when Save now clicked
TradeList > renders LONG and SHORT badges with normalized labels and classes
TradeList > renders PositionCard components in compactView
TradeFactory > should create a valid Trade
TradeFactory > should throw on invalid symbol
TradeFactory > should throw on invalid entryDate
TradeFactory > should throw on invalid size
TradeFactory > should throw on invalid price
EntryDate VO helpers > toInputValue returns a datetime-local string parseable by Date
EntryDate VO helpers > toInputValue(iso) and fromInputValue roundtrip
EntryDate VO helpers > fromInputValue throws EntryDateInvalidError for invalid input
Leverage VO > accepts undefined and numeric values
Leverage VO > throws on invalid numbers (<=0 or NaN)
Margin Value Object > should create a Margin for positive values
Margin Value Object > should throw for zero or negative values
Margin Value Object > should throw for NaN or non-number
Market VO > normalizes forex and crypto
Market VO > throws on invalid market
